name: Way of the Astral Self
description: Astral Self monks manifest spectral limbs and visages to fight beyond physical limits.

3.name: Arms of the Astral Self
3.description: You summon spectral arms that enhance reach and damage.

6.name: Visage of the Astral Self
6.description: You manifest a spectral visage that enhances perception.

11.name: Body of the Astral Self
11.description: Your astral form enhances defense and offense.

17.name: Awakening of the Astral Self
17.description: Your astral self reaches full power.
